I have been working for 13 years with software development, started my career and community participation with Java in Brazil. I'm a curious developer that likes tiny devices (mobile and embedded), I've already developed using Java ME, Android and now working as a Developer Advocate on the Actions on Google team, helping developers to create high quality Actions for the Google Assistant platform.
